strings.Value: "Spells all almost wasted… Pointless stuff, anyway, right?"
"I don't know why I got involved in this crappy magic… it's as useful as nipples on a breastplate!"
"In your case, I suppose so. You should stick to your giant sword, and leave magic to those you have a talent for it."
"Don't give up on magic so soon. It's more powerful than it seems at first."
"Oh, not at all! Magic is a wonderful power — if you use it wisely and put time and effort into learning it."
"Don't sweat it! Only a select few can master both magic and the sword! Ha, ha, ha, hmm..."
